_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four bases of psychic power [sn51.10: Made them a vehicle and a basis
The Buddha's statement to Māra [sn51.10:: The Buddha's statement about not becoming fully extinguished
Having competent, educated, assured, learned monk disciples who practice in line with the teachings
Having competent, educated, assured, learned nun disciples who practice in line with the teachings
Having competent, educated, assured, learned layman and laywoman disciples who practice in line with the teachings
The success and prosperity of the Buddha's spiritual path
